plot: A NASA drone operator's mission is to travel from Los Angeles to Seattle for picture analysis when a minor malfunction occurs with a camera lens. Mission control dispatches a technician to fix the problem.
title: Horus Red
plot_es: A NASA drone operator's mission is to travel from Los Angeles to Seattle for picture analysis when a minor malfunction occurs with a camera lens. Mission control dispatches a technician to fix the problem.
